author: IGN
description:
Watch the Combat Basics Gameplay Trailer for Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion, an action sci-fi open-world game developed by Marvelous. Players can get the rundown on the basics of combat to see what the Arsenal is capable of, alongside a glimpse of some of the titanic bosses waiting to challenge players’ skills. Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion is launching on September 5 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).

#DaemonXMachinaTitanicScion #Gaming #IGN
title: Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion - Official Combat Basics Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Isleweaver Teaser Trailer for Warframe, a free-to-play third-person action shooter developed by Digital Extremes. Players will soon experience the Isleweaver turning Duviri on its head. Alongside Isleweaver, the return of Major Neci Rusalka will arrive alongside the opportunity to unleash the Warframes in Duviri with a unique twist on Duviri gameplay. Isleweaver for Warframe is launching in June 2025.

#Warframe #Isleweaver #Gaming
title: Warframe - Official Isleweaver Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Preludes Gameplay Spotlight Trailer for Soulframe, an upcoming free-to-play action-adventure open-world RPG game developed by Digital Extremes. Get a look at some exploration, combat gameplay, and more from Soulframe by the creators of Warframe. Soulframe is coming soon with more to be announced at Tennocon on July 19.

#Soulframe #Gaming #IGN
title: Soulframe - Official Preludes Gameplay Spotlight Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Magic: The Gathering - Final Fantasy Set is set to launch June 13th, so we decided to chat with the Game Designers themselves to better understand how they brought this new Universes Beyond Magic set to life. 

We were lucky to speak to Zakeel Gordon (Executive Producer), Gavin Verhey (Principal Designer & Set Design Lead for FINAL FANTASY), Dillon Deveney (Principal Game Designer), and Daniel Holt (Senior Game Designer)

Launching June 13, the upcoming Universes Beyond Magic set represents a rich universe with iconic elements that fans have come to love over the franchise's history. Fans will see characters from every mainline FINAL FANTASY game, depicted through the lens of Magic: The Gathering. The set is available for preorder now at local game stores, online retailers, and elsewhere Magic products are sold.

Presented by The United States Air Force

#MagicTheGathering #FinalFantasy #Gaming
title: How Did They Bring Final Fantasy to Life in Magic: The Gathering

author: IGN
description:
Check out the trailer for Together, an upcoming horror film starring Alison Brie and Dave Franco.

Years into their relationship, Tim and Millie (Dave Franco and Alison Brie) find themselves at a crossroads as they move to the country, abandoning all that is familiar in their lives except each other. With tensions already flaring, a nightmarish encounter with a mysterious, unnatural force threatens to corrupt their lives, their love, and their flesh.

Together, directed by Michael Shanks, opens in theaters on July 30, 2025.

#Together #IGN #Movies
title: Together - Official Trailer (2025) Dave Franco, Alison Brie

author: IGN
description:
Ready to romance Lune in Clair Obscur: Expedition 33? This complete guide walks you through every step of her relationship path, from early interactions to unlocking her full romance questline. Important Warning: This video contains light SPOILERS, especially regarding story progression and key romance decisions. If you're avoiding all narrative details, proceed with caution.
In this video, we explain how to avoid locking yourself out of Lune’s romance path, detail every relationship level milestone from 1 to 6, and walk you through the full sidequest tied to her romance.. We also break down the final dialogue choices needed to complete her storyline.

Timecodes:
0:00 - Intro
0:18 - Don't Lock Yourself Out (SPOILERS START HERE)
0:58 - Early Relationship Levels (Pre-Romance)
2:00 - Romance Questline
2:42 - Outro
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - Lune Romance Guide | Full Walkthrough (SPOILERS)

author: IGN
description:
Looking for the Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Sciel romance path? This complete guide covers how to start, progress, and complete Sciel’s romance storyline, including every dialogue choice you need to make from Act 2 onward.

We walk you through every relationship level from 1 to 7, detail how to avoid getting locked out of the romance, and explain how your decisions impact the ability to romance Lune instead. Whether you're aiming for a romantic or platonic relationship with Sciel, we’ve got every outcome covered.

00:00 - Intro  
00:21 - Romance in Clair Obscur: Expedition 33  
00:39 - How to start Sciel’s romance path  
01:01 - Leveling up with Sciel  
01:15 - The crucial choice at the relationship - Level 4  
02:03 - Defining the relationship - Level 5  
02:25 - Swimming lessons and final decision - Level 6  
02:49 - Closing out Sciel’s arc - Level 7  
03:14 - Outro

#IGN #Gaming
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - Sciel Romance Guide | Full Walkthrough (SPOILERS)

author: IGN
description:
Watch the 'She Wants Us Gone' Clip from Marvel Studios' Thunderbolts aka The New Avengers, the latest film installment in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. While Bob makes his introduction to the team, the rest of the Thunderbolts deduce that the mission they were sent on was a scheme to take them all out at once. Marvel Studios' Thunderbolts aka The New Avengers is in theaters now.

In Thunderbolts, Marvel Studios assembles an unconventional team of antiheroes—Yelena Belova, Bucky Barnes, Red Guardian, Ghost, Taskmaster and John Walker. After finding themselves ensnared in a death trap set by Valentina Allegra de Fontaine, these disillusioned castoffs must embark on a dangerous mission that will force them to confront the darkest corners of their pasts. Will this dysfunctional group tear themselves apart, or find redemption and unite as something much more before it’s too late?

Jake Schreier directs Thunderbolts and Kevin Feige is the producer. Louis D’Esposito, Brian Chapek and Jason
title: Marvel Studios' Thunderbolts - Official 'She Wants Us Gone' Clip (2025) Florence Pugh, Wyatt Russell

author: IGN
description:
Bloober Team’s SILENT HILL 2 (2024) gets the speedrun treatment, and the original developers are watching every second. In this episode of Devs React to Speedruns, Lead Producer Maciej Głomb and Creative Director & Lead Designer Mateusz Lenart sit down to react to an absolutely haunting and lightning-fast run from speedrunner Hazeblade.

Watch as they break down skips, discuss level design choices, and share behind-the-scenes insights while Hazeblade blazes through the fog-drenched streets of SILENT HILL. From clever item management to terrifying boss fights, no trick goes unnoticed as the developers reflect on how the remake's design holds up under extreme pressure.

Check out more from Hazeblade here:
https://www.twitch.tv/hazeblade
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFNl8SLm-iSMUBLt84dNIfw
https://x.com/hazebladetv

#IGN #Gaming #Speedruns
title: Developers React to Speedruns | SILENT HILL 2 (2024)

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the New Features Introduction Trailer for Onimusha 2: Samurai's Destiny, a remaster of the classic action game developed by Capcom. This modern version of Onimisha 2: Samurai's Destiny is packed with new features such as Easy Mode being available from the start, a new "Hell" difficulty mode, a Special Outfit, the game's Original Soundtrack, and more. Onimusha 2: Samurai's Destiny is launching on May 23 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).

#Onimusha2 #Gaming #IGN
title: Onimusha 2: Samurai's Destiny - Official New Features Introduction Trailer

author: IGN
description:
2025 is almost halfway over - and while this year has already had its share of massive game releases, some of the biggest ones are still on the way - and probably quite a few we don’t know about. So, as it stands now, here are 2025’s biggest game releases… that didn’t happen yet! 

00:00 - INTRO, MAY: Doom: The Dark Ages, Onimusha 2: Samurai’s Destiny, Elden Ring: Nightreign
00:58 - JUNE: Switch 2, IGN Live,Mario Kart World, Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour, Survival Kids, Fast Fusion
02:08 - JUNE: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild & The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom, Deltarune, Rapid Fire Switch 2 Ports
03:25 - JUNE: Dune: Awakening, Five Nights at Freddy’s: Secret of the Mimic, Tron Catalyst, Death Stranding 2: On the Beach
04:32 - JULY: Super Mario Party Jamboree and Jamboree TV, Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 and 4, Donkey Kong Bananza
05:56 - AUGUST: Gears of War: Reloaded, Metal Gear Solid Delta 3: Snake Eater, Shinobi: Art of Vengeance, Lost Soul Aside, 
08:05 - SEPTEMBER
title: The Biggest Games Still to Come in 2025 - Spring Update

author: IGN
description:
Masahiro Sakurai is returning to the Kirby franchise with Kirby Air Riders for Switch 2, his first Kirby game in over 20 years. This clip dives into why the original Kirby Air Ride (2003) became a cult classic, what made its City Trial mode so special, and how Sakurai could modernize the formula for Air Riders.

From the game’s unique two-button design to Sakurai’s post-Air Ride career (including Smash Bros. and Kid Icarus), we break down why this announcement is a major moment for Nintendo fans.

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo
title: Kirby Air Riders: How Sakurai Could Evolve the GameCube Cult Classic - NVC Clips

author: IGN
description:
We got Andy Serkis to react to Andy Serkis memes!
Andy Serkis (Renoir from Clair Obscur: Expedition 33), reacts to popular images and memes about some of Andy's greatest characters, from Gollum, Caesar, Snoke, King Kong and more!
title: Andy Serkis Reacts to Andy Serkis Memes

author: IGN
title: The new DOOM has more in common with Devil May Cry than you might expect
